channel.title: Alternative Healthpod
channel.description: Dr. Avery Jenkins, a primary care chiropractic physician discusses the latest research in alternative medicine and applying these findings to your own health. Subjects include acupuncture, chiropractic, nutrition and herbal therapy.
channel.itunes:summary: Dr. Avery Jenkins, a primary care chiropractic physician discusses the latest research in alternative medicine and applying these findings to your own health. Subjects include acupuncture, chiropractic, nutrition and herbal therapy.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn how to be healthier in only 5 minutes per week!
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Avery Jenkins

item.title: Brittle Bones and Bad Drugs
item.itunes:author: Dr. Avery Jenkins
item.dc:creator: Dr. Avery Jenkins
item.description: Recent research shows that popular osteoporosis drugs actually harm bone, not help it. Dr. Jenkins looks at the research and discusses what you can do to prevent this common bone disorder.
item.content:encoded: Recent research shows that popular osteoporosis drugs actually harm bone, not help it. Dr. Jenkins looks at the research and discusses what you can do to prevent this common bone disorder.
item.itunes:subtitle: Osteoporosis Pharmaceutical Failure
item.itunes:summary: Recent research shows that popular osteoporosis drugs actually harm bone, not help it. Dr. Jenkins looks at the research and discusses what you can do to prevent this common bone disorder.
item.itunes:keywords: alternative medicine, osteoporosis, health, nutrition, chiropractic, acupuncture, prescription

item.title: Sunshine and Your Health

item.description: Dr. Jenkins discusses the importance of the proper amount of sun exposure, and explores some of the medical myths concerning sun and vitamin D.
